additionalDescription: Sounds downloaded from Xeno-Canto (they include the recording id in the paper). The number of audio files and the total duration exclude the unknown class
description:
The dataset is comprised of field recordings of eleven bird species,
consisting of 2762 bird acoustic events with 339 detected "unknown" events
(corresponding to noise or unknown species vocalizations).

reference:  
1.Zhao Zhao, Sai-hua Zhang, Zhi-yong Xu, Kristen Bellisario, Nian-hua Dai,
Hichem Omrani, Bryan C. Pijanowski."Automated bird acoustic event detection
and robust species classification." Ecological Informatics 39(2017):99-108.  
2.Sai-hua Zhang, Zhao Zhao, Zhi-yong Xu, Kristen Bellisario, Bryan C.
Pijanowski."AUTOMATIC BIRD VOCALIZATION IDENTIFICATION BASED ON FUSION OF
SPECTRAL PATTERN AND TEXTURE FEATURES."ICASSP(2018):271-275.
name: North-american bird species
